brDecisionText.para:
The elements which must be presented Highlights (HIGH), are: Highlights data module entry details
<dmCode>
<identExtension> (if any)
<simplePara> or <simpleRefPara>
<reasonForUpdate>
Remove insert list entry details
<dmCode>
<identExtension> (if any)
<issueDate>

The attribute which must be presented Highlights (HIGH) both of data module or remove insert entry details, are:
applicRefId
issueType (only N = New/reinstate[-status/-changed/-revised]; C = changed/revised/status;)
